reapack.name: 7R Adds [Frozen] to Frozen Track's Name.lua
reapack.desc: 7R Adds/Removes [Frozen] to Frozen Track's Name based on Undo History

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: initial

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: Reacts to Undo History: adds [Frozen] when tracks are frozen, removes it when unfrozen. SWS required.

reapack.name: 7R Insert FX Based on Selection under Mouse (Item, Track and Master).lua
reapack.desc: 7R Insert FX Based on Selection under Mouse cursor (Track or Item, Master)

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: - GUI Version! - Basic settings - GUI for user folders and FX - Inserts based on mouse cursor (Track, Item, Master) - Supports VST, VST3 and Clap (No AU, LV2 or JS) - Cache for quick startup - Save and load settings - Multiple basic settings for behaviour

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: - Shift modifier to add to input FX` - hovering on FX chain window adds to track (use global shortcut for non focused hover)

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: - Removed Bar:Beat and Beats export options for debugging and revision. - Fixed item-relative marker filtering when time selection is active and item is not at project start.

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: - Added back Bar and Beat support - Fixed item-relative marker filtering when time selection is active and item is not at project start.

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: - Added Custom export option - Added Preset save and load options - Fixed some value bugs

version.author: 7thResonance

version.author: 7thResonance
